title: No, Oxford University is not offering a scholarship in the name of Manmohan Singh
subtitle: No scholarship program is being offered by Oxford University in the name of Manmohan Singh. Oxford University’s official website has no listing of such a scholarship program.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A post claiming that Oxford University is offering a scholarship in the name of former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh is being shared on social media. Oxford University is a renowned university in England. But FACTLY has found that there is no scholarship program being offered by Oxford University in the name of Manmohan Singh. Oxford University’s official website has no listing of such a scholarship program. The message that Oxford University is offering a scholarship in the name of Manmohan Singh is being shared since 2017. During the search process, it was found that Cambridge university offers a scholarship in the name of Manmohan Singh.

Did you watch our new video?
